sentence.Network_en: This unit will yield a 50 - megaton nuclear blast in ten seconds.

entry.tran: 兆吨，百万吨级(可用于计算核爆炸力，相当于100万吨梯恩梯炸药的爆炸威力)
entry.def: You can use megaton to refer to the power of a nuclear weapon. A one megaton bomb has the same power as one million tons of TNT.

means.word_mean: 1. a measure of explosive power (of an atomic weapon) equal to that of one million tons of TNT
